Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: dr white
Reviews.Content: was very surprised at the poor quality from this manufacturer. the camera is built to survive a tank rolling over it but the on/off button stuck in and you could not release it on the TWO cameras i bought...a very disappointed 3 year old on Christmas morning would not recommend this product i do not think it deserves even the one star. shame on you crayola

Reviews.Title: ??? What...
Reviews.Author: J Johns "JJohns"
Reviews.Content: I order this item, it says green, but I was sent a yellow one...no big deal, I asked my 5 year old if that was ok...it was except he pointed out it had NO guts in it.  That's right no lens, no screen, no battery hold.  I'm sure this is a one off thing, but wow...he was really hoping to be able to use it. I've upload a picture...

Reviews.Title: Fun
Reviews.Author: G. Guel "lovely"
Reviews.Content: My little girl loves it. she takes picture of everything. Came in the mail very fast. Color varies from what I order but she still likes it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera and easily repairable
Reviews.Author: Alexander Fafinski
Reviews.Content: Ok I have seen all the reviews and experienced similar problems but it is not the end of the world and for just over a dollar you can fix the camera.  The shutter button on my daughters stopped working, and after examining it I found the switch had broken.  A quick drive to the local electronics store for a 4 pack of SPST tact switches (single pole, single throw, momentary contact switches) cost me $4.50, then about 5 mins with a soldering iron and it works better than new.  I know not everyone is willing to try a repair like this but it is cheap and easy and now my little girls says I am her hero.  No excuses for Crayola, they should have built a better product to begin with but at least it was easy to work with and the parts are in stock at most local electronics stores.

ProductInfo.Features:
Takes up to 120 photos or a few minutes of video
Easy to hold for small hands
Easy to see preview screen
ProductInfo.Name: Crayola 2.1 MP Camera - Green (24073-PDQ) Colors May Vary
